messages.message:
Hi team, just wanted to ask if anyone has ran into this error trying to start `search-tservice` using `make clean build runlocal`  (I'm on an M1)
```
2023/06/06 12:32:40 ERROR searchservice/es/client.go:514 -- [INTERNAL]: Could not create index template es-local-counter-template. Error Put "http://:9200/_template/es-local-counter-template": write tcp 127.0.0.1:52103->127.0.0.1:9200: use of closed network connection
2023/06/06 12:32:40 ERROR searchservice/main.go:493 -- Error: Could not create index template es-local-counter-template. Error Put "http://:9200/_template/es-local-counter-template": write tcp 127.0.0.1:52103->127.0.0.1:9200: use of closed network connection
2023/06/06 12:32:40 INFO utils/debug/debug.go:219 -- Stopped HTTP server for debug
panic: code = INTERNAL msg = Could not create index template es-local-counter-template. Error Put "http://:9200/_template/es-local-counter-template": write tcp 127.0.0.1:52103->127.0.0.1:9200: use of closed network connection

goroutine 1 [running]:
main.main.func1({0x578be60?, 0xc00074dc00?})
	/Users/jzhang/instabase/data-services/search-services/search-tservice/src/go/src/instabase/searchservice/main.go:494 +0xc5
main.main()
	/Users/jzhang/instabase/data-services/search-services/search-tservice/src/go/src/instabase/searchservice/main.go:503 +0xadc
exit status 2
make: *** [runlocal] Error 1```

Hi Jeff, the error message indicates that this appears to be network related?
```2023/06/06 12:32:40 ERROR searchservice/es/client.go:514 -- [INTERNAL]: Could not create index template es-local-counter-template. Error Put "http://:9200/_template/es-local-counter-template": write tcp 127.0.0.1:52103->127.0.0.1:9200: use of closed network connection```
Have you started elasticsearch/opensearc?
Hi, issue was resolved by rebuilding open search and restarting before running search service
